leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 物理-控制/反问题/最优化生态
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 优化/推断库 + 可微分框架

queries: [WEB] physics informed neural networks benchmark suite github
[WEB] inverse problem deep learning baselines github
[WEB] reinforcement learning physics control gym github

tools.name: Gymnasium
tools.one_line_profile: Standard API for reinforcement learning environments
tools.detailed_description: An API standard for single-agent reinforcement learning environments, with popular reference environments and related utilities. It serves as a foundational platform for developing and comparing reinforcement learning algorithms, widely used in physics-based control tasks.

tools.name: Newton Dynamics
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated solution for real-time simulation of physics environments
tools.detailed_description: Newton Dynamics is an integrated solution for real-time simulation of physics environments. It provides a deterministic physics engine capable of handling complex rigid body dynamics, widely used in simulations and game development.

tools.name: DrivAerNet
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale multimodal car dataset with CFD simulations and benchmarks
tools.detailed_description: A Large-Scale Multimodal Car Dataset with Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) Simulations and Deep Learning Benchmarks. It provides a standardized resource for training and evaluating surrogate models for aerodynamic drag prediction and flow field reconstruction.

tools.name: openuav-turbovnc
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation environment for UAVs using Gazebo and Unity3D
tools.detailed_description: Simulation environment for UAVs, ROVs and AUVs using Gazebo physics and Unity3D rendering. It enables high-fidelity simulation for developing and testing autonomous vehicle control algorithms.

tools.name: DiffEqDevTools.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking and development tools for differential equations
tools.detailed_description: Benchmarking, testing, and development tools for differential equations and scientific machine learning (SciML). It provides utilities for performance analysis, convergence testing, and solver comparison within the Julia SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: SciMLBenchmarks.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarks for scientific machine learning and equation solvers
tools.detailed_description: Scientific machine learning (SciML) benchmarks, AI for science, and (differential) equation solvers. It covers a wide range of benchmarks for Julia, Python (PyTorch, Jax), MATLAB, and R, serving as a central reference for solver performance.

tools.name: racecar_gym
tools.one_line_profile: Gym environment for a miniature racecar using PyBullet
tools.detailed_description: A gym environment for a miniature racecar using the pybullet physics engine. It provides a realistic simulation setting for testing reinforcement learning algorithms on vehicle control tasks.

tools.name: COOLFluiD
tools.one_line_profile: Collaborative simulation environment for multi-physics simulations
tools.detailed_description: COOLFluiD is a collaborative simulation environment focused on complex multi-physics simulations. It provides a component-based framework for developing numerical solvers for fluid dynamics and other physical phenomena.

tools.name: DeepInverse
tools.one_line_profile: Library for solving imaging inverse problems using deep learning
tools.detailed_description: DeepInverse is a PyTorch library for solving imaging inverse problems using deep learning. It provides a unified framework for training and evaluating deep learning methods for tasks such as denoising, super-resolution, and reconstruction.

tools.name: dm_control
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-based simulation and Reinforcement Learning environments using MuJoCo
tools.detailed_description: Google DeepMind's software stack for physics-based simulation and Reinforcement Learning environments, using MuJoCo. It provides a collection of environments and tools for developing and testing control algorithms.

tools.name: gymprecice
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for RL environments in active flow control
tools.detailed_description: A framework to design and develop reinforcement learning environments for single- and multi-physics active flow control. It acts as an adapter connecting OpenAI Gym with the preCICE coupling library to interface with various physics solvers.

tools.name: PINNacle
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive benchmark of Physics-Informed Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: Codebase for PINNacle: A Comprehensive Benchmark of Physics-Informed Neural Networks for Solving PDEs. It provides a standardized evaluation framework for various PINN architectures on diverse PDE problems.

tools.name: IsaacGymEnvs
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement learning environments for Isaac Gym
tools.detailed_description: Isaac Gym Reinforcement Learning Environments. It provides high-performance, GPU-accelerated simulation environments for training reinforcement learning agents in robotics and physics tasks.

tools.name: DeepXDE
tools.one_line_profile: Library for scientific machine learning and physics-informed learning
tools.detailed_description: A library for scientific machine learning and physics-informed learning. It provides a comprehensive suite of tools for solving partial differential equations (PDEs) using physics-informed neural networks (PINNs) and other deep learning methods.

tools.name: safe_exp_env
tools.one_line_profile: Safe exploration environments for autonomous driving based on Safety Gym
tools.detailed_description: A third-party implementation of safety-gym environments specifically designed for safe exploration in autonomous driving tasks. It serves as a benchmark environment for constrained reinforcement learning algorithms.

tools.name: 1d-pinn-reconstruction
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Transformer for plasma space-time reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A Physics-Informed Transformer Neural Network implementation used to reconstruct one-dimensional (M)HD shocktubes from partial samples. Developed by NASA, it serves as a reproduction and modeling tool for plasma physics reconstruction tasks.

tools.name: OMUSE
tools.one_line_profile: Oceanographic Multi-purpose Software Environment
tools.detailed_description: A package for multi-physics and multi-scale earth science simulations, specifically focusing on oceanography. It provides an environment to couple different simulation codes for complex earth system modeling.

tools.name: PDEBench
tools.one_line_profile: Extensive benchmark suite for Scientific Machine Learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite for scientific machine learning tasks involving Partial Differential Equations (PDEs). It provides a wide range of PDE datasets and baseline models to evaluate neural PDE solvers.

tools.name: gym-anm
tools.one_line_profile: RL environments for Active Network Management in electricity grids
tools.detailed_description: A framework for designing Reinforcement Learning environments that model Active Network Management (ANM) tasks in electricity distribution networks, facilitating the development and benchmarking of control algorithms for smart grids.

tools.name: MORFEUS
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-physics Object-oriented Reconfigurable Fluid Environment
tools.detailed_description: A multi-physics, object-oriented, reconfigurable fluid environment designed for unified simulations. It supports complex fluid dynamics simulations with a focus on reconfigurability.

tools.name: DeepXDE-ZCS
tools.one_line_profile: ZCS integrated version of the DeepXDE library
tools.detailed_description: A specialized version of the DeepXDE library integrated with ZCS (likely a specific solver or method extension), maintained by STFC SciML group for solving differential equations using neural networks.

tools.name: SciML-Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking Suite for AI for Science
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite developed by STFC to evaluate the performance of AI methods across various scientific domains, providing standardized metrics and datasets for AI4S.

tools.name: Tissue Forge
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive particle-based modeling environment for biology and physics
tools.detailed_description: An interactive, particle-based environment for modeling and simulation in physics, chemistry, and biology. It allows for complex tissue and cellular simulations.

tools.name: APEBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for autoregressive neural emulation of PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite specifically designed for autoregressive neural emulation of Partial Differential Equations (PDEs). It includes over 46 PDEs in 1D, 2D, and 3D, supporting differentiable physics and rollout metrics.

tools.name: autoreg-pde-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Autoregressive Conditional Diffusion Models in Flow Simulation
tools.detailed_description: A repository for benchmarking and implementing autoregressive conditional diffusion models specifically for turbulent flow simulations. It serves as a reference implementation and benchmark for this class of models.

tools.name: safe-control-gym
tools.one_line_profile: PyBullet environments for learning-based control with symbolic dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A collection of PyBullet-based environments (CartPole, Quadrotor) integrated with CasADi symbolic a priori dynamics. Designed for benchmarking learning-based control and reinforcement learning algorithms with safety constraints.

tools.name: ControlGym
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale control environments for benchmarking RL algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A library providing large-scale control environments designed to benchmark Reinforcement Learning algorithms, facilitating the evaluation of control strategies in complex settings.

tools.name: Multiphysics-Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Scientific Machine Learning on multiphysics PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite dedicated to investigating and evaluating Scientific Machine Learning (SciML) methods for solving multiphysics Partial Differential Equations.

tools.name: inn-surrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse problem solver using conditional invertible neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A tool for solving inverse problems using conditional invertible neural networks (cINNs), serving as a surrogate model for complex scientific inference tasks.
